title: Pokémon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
description: Ash’s journey to the top of the Indigo League continues—but will his friendship with fellow Pokémon League competitor Richie endanger his chances? With his Kanto journey completed, Ash finds there’s still plenty to see and do when Professor Oak sends him and his friends to the Orange Islands. Brock falls head-over-heels for the attractive Professor Ivy and decides to stay with her, leaving Ash and Misty alone as a dynamic duo—at least until they meet intrepid Pokémon watcher Tracey Sketchit!

media.title: Princess vs. Princess
media.description: Misty and Jessie compete to be Queen of the Princess Festival! Ash and Brock lend Misty their Pokémon for the battle, and Jessie takes a licking despite a surprise Pokémon of her own.

media.title: The Purr-fect Hero
media.description: It’s Kids Day, and Ash and friends help some schoolchildren celebrate. Team Rocket spoils the fun by grabbing a kid instead of Pikachu. In a shocking turn of events, Meowth becomes a good guy...or does he?

media.title: Riddle Me This
media.description: Our heroes travel to Cinnabar Island, where Ash hopes to win the Volcano Badge. A strange character offers riddles about how to find the Gym, where Ash and Pikachu have a fiery battle with a Pokémon they’ve never seen before!

media.title: Volcanic Panic
media.description: Ash has finally located the Gym, suspended above a pool of molten lava! Only a strong Fire-type Pokémon could help him in this battle for the Volcano Badge, so Ash must rely on his misbehaving Charizard.

media.title: Beach Blank-out Blastoise
media.description: As Ash and the gang are rushing to catch the last ferry off of Cinnabar Island, they get sidetracked by a group of Squirtle, Wartortle, and Blastoise who need their help!

media.title: The Misty Mermaid
media.description: Misty's Horsea is in desperate need of exercise, so the gang decides to take it to her sisters' Gym in Cerulean City. There, she learns that her sisters are planning an exciting underwater ballet.

media.title: Clefairy Tales
media.description: Ash, Brock, and Misty get sidetracked on their way to Viridian City when all of their belongings mysteriously disappear. While searching for their missing things, they find themselves mixed up in a close encounter that’s really out of this world!

media.title: The Battle of the Badge
media.description: Our heroes make their way to Viridian City, where Ash hopes to earn the Earth Badge. They get to the Gym just in time to see his rival, Gary, being defeated by an unknown Pokémon—and Gary insists that it's evil!

media.title: It’s Mr. Mime Time
media.description: On their way back to Pallet Town, our heroes encounter a runaway Mr. Mime. Ash disguises himself as another Mr. Mime so he can get close. When Team Rocket strikes, will they catch the right Mr. Mime?

media.title: Snow Way Out!
media.description: Our heroes find themselves at a fork in the road and decide to climb a steep and dangerous mountain. Pikachu gets lost, and they must all work together to find it, stay warm, and weather a storm.

media.title: Showdown at the Po-ké Corral
media.description: On a visit to Professor Oak’s house, Ash runs into Gary, and they talk about the upcoming Pokémon League. Professor Oak says they should learn from each other rather than competing, and that teamwork pays off when Team Rocket attacks!

media.title: The Evolution Solution
media.description: Ash joins his mom for a vacation on Seafoam Island. While there, he seeks out the programmer of the Pokédex to learn about the unusual Evolution of SlowPoké. This mystery is surprisingly revealed by Team Rocket's bumbling!

media.title: The Pi-Kahuna
media.description: When Ash wipes out during a surfing attempt, Victor rescues him and tells him about Humungadunga, a giant wave that sweeps through every 20 years. Can Ash and Pikachu give Victor the confidence he needs to catch the giant wave?

media.title: Make Room for Gloom!
media.description: Back in Pallet Town, Ash and friends meet Florinda, who works at the local nursery. Her Gloom won't evolve, so she’s afraid she's not training it properly. When Team Rocket attacks, everyone sees just how strong a Pokémon can become!

media.title: Lights, Camera, Quack-tion!
media.description: A famous director comes to town, and everybody wants to be the star! Since he only wants Pokémon in his movie, Ash, Brock, Misty, and Team Rocket fight hard to make sure it’s their Pokémon that will star opposite Wigglytuff.

media.title: Go West Young Meowth
media.description: When the gang attends the premiere of “Pokémon in Love,” Meowth looks back on his painful past. He shares the story of his life before Team Rocket, including how he learned to walk and talk like a human.

media.title: To Master the Onixpected
media.description: With only three weeks left before the Pokémon League competition, Ash, Brock, and Misty head up to Mt. Hideaway to find one of the Elite Four. They're after Pokémon training tips, but they discover a land of overgrown Onix instead!

media.title: The Ancient Puzzle of Pokémopolis
media.description: While Ash and Brock train for the Pokémon League, they uncover a hidden temple containing Pokémon fossils. Misty remembers a hidden city where people built temples to honor Pokémon. Could they have stumbled upon the ancient city of Pokémopolis?

media.title: Bad to the Bone
media.description: Our heroes are headed to the Pokémon League tournament at the Indigo Plateau when they meet another Trainer going their way. Unfortunately, all of his Gym badges have been stolen, so he can't compete...unless he takes Ash's badges instead!

media.title: All Fired Up!
media.description: The Pokémon League is about to begin with the ceremonial lighting of the torch, which carries a flame from the Legendary Pokémon Moltres. Of course, Team Rocket tries to steal it!

media.title: Round One—Begin!
media.description: It's the first day of the Pokémon League, and when Ash's friends learn his first battle will be held on the Water Field, they're full of advice!

media.title: Fire and Ice
media.description: As the Pokémon League continues, Ash battles on the Rock Field and has a run-in with Team Rocket after they set up a fake Pokémon Center to lure unwary Trainers!

media.title: The Fourth Round Rumble
media.description: Ash faces his toughest opponent yet on the Grass Field at the Pokémon League! Are he and his Bulbasaur ready to take on his opponent and her powerful Scyther?

media.title: A Friend in Deed
media.description: When Ash meets a like-minded Trainer named Richie at the Pokémon League, the two boys quickly become close friends—and so do their two Pikachu!

media.title: Friend and Foe Alike
media.description: In the fifth round of the Pokémon League, Ash and Richie are matched up against each other! Can their friendship withstand this important battle?

media.title: Friends to the End
media.description: Ash, Misty, and Brock are in the stands cheering for Richie as the Pokémon League winds down, and then they march together in the closing ceremonies. It's an experience that will stick with Ash throughout his journey as a Trainer!

media.title: Pallet Party Panic
media.description: Ash and friends return to Pallet Town for a hero's welcome, only to be sent on another journey right away! Professor Oak is seeking a mysterious-looking Poké Ball, and he asks Ash, Brock, and Misty to find it for him.

media.title: A Scare in the Air
media.description: Our heroes prepare for their long journey to Valencia Island to bring back a mysterious Poké Ball for Professor Oak. When Ash wins a free blimp ride, it seems their travel woes are no more—but who's flying this thing?

media.title: Pokéball Peril
media.description: After making a crash landing onto Valencia Island, our heroes get directions to Professor Ivy’s laboratory, where the mysterious Poké Ball is being held. Brock is delighted to discover that the professor and her colleagues are fellow Pokémon breeders

media.title: The Lost Lapras
media.description: Thanks to Jigglypuff's sleep-inducing song, the blimp carrying Ash and Misty back home goes off course and crashes on an island, where they meet a new friend named Tracey while trying to help a lost Lapras.

media.title: Fit to Be Tide
media.description: Ash, Misty, and Tracey set out to explore the Orange Islands, and Ash is determined to qualify for the Orange League! He soon learns that the Orange Crew challenges are a little different from the usual Gym battles.

media.title: Pikachu Re-Volts
media.description: When Ash, Misty, and Tracey arrive on Mandarin Island, Pikachu and Togepi turn against them and join a group of other angry Pokémon. When the misbehaving Pokémon disappear, Officer Jenny informs them that dozens of Pokémon have been reported missing!

media.title: The Crystal Onix
media.description: Ash finds a message in a bottle, which leads our heroes to a new adventure on Sunburst Island and a search for a very special Onix!

media.title: In the Pink
media.description: Our heroes find themselves on Pinkan Island, home to a large number of strangely colored Pokémon. Ash and Tracey are fascinated by these pink Pokémon…and so are the Team Rocket trio!

media.title: Shell Shock!
media.description: After joining a scientific expedition to investigate a Kabuto fossil, Ash and friends soon find themselves facing a series of natural disasters!

media.title: Bye, Bye Psyduck
media.description: Another Water-type specialist challenges Misty to a battle and offers some advice: she thinks Misty's Psyduck might be ready to evolve!

media.title: The Joy of Pokémon
media.description: Our heroes meet a very busy Nurse Joy who has to do some serious island-hopping to take care of all the Pokémon in the area! Can they help protect her from Team Rocket?

media.title: Navel Maneuvers
media.description: In Ash's second challenge against the Orange Crew, he must climb a mountain, build a bobsled, and win a sled race! Do his Pokémon have what it takes to help him through these obstacles?

media.title: Snack Attack
media.description: Our heroes' explorations take them to the seven Grapefruit Islands, where they learn that the islands' famous fruit has been disappearing! Ash, Misty, and Tracey set out to catch whoever's responsible.

media.title: A Shipful of Shivers
media.description: When divers recover an ancient Orange League Championship trophy, our heroes head straight for the art museum where it's on display to check it out! Unfortunately, Team Rocket has beaten them to the punch…

media.title: Meowth Rules!
media.description: When Team Rocket crashes on an island, Meowth is the center of attention when the locals mistake him for the "Great Meowth of Bounty," a powerful creature spoken of in prophecy. What will happen when they learn the truth?

media.title: Tracey Gets Bugged
media.description: Misty is not pleased when our heroes land on an island swarming with Bug-type Pokémon, though Ash and Tracey are having a blast. When they find an injured Scyther, can Misty overcome her disgust and help out?

media.title: A Way Off Day Off
media.description: When Ash and friends find a wonderful island brimming with many kinds of fruit trees, they decide to take a break and enjoy the bounty! Of course, Team Rocket has other ideas…

media.title: Wherefore Art Thou, Pokémon?
media.description: Our heroes meet a couple of Trainers who don't seem to get along at all, even though their Nidoran are obviously smitten with each other. Misty is determined to solve this romantic challenge!

media.title: Get Along, Little Pokémon
media.description: Slogging through a thunderstorm, our heroes notice a group of Magnemite soaking up electricity from the lightning bolts. When they finally get into town to rest, there's a blackout! Can the Magnemite help?

media.title: The Mystery Menace
media.description: In Trovitopolis City, Ash and friends hear stories about some kind of monster that's been scaring everyone—and when the ground cracks open and dumps them in the sewer, it seems they might meet this monster face to face!

media.title: Misty Meets Her Match
media.description: After Misty dives into a whirlpool to rescue a girl, she learns that the girl's brother, Rudy, has a giant crush on her. Things get more complicated when it turns out he's also the Gym Leader Ash must challenge next!

media.title: Bound for Trouble
media.description: Ash and friends go in search of super-sized Pokémon, but when they fall for a Team Rocket trick, and then Pikachu and Meowth get snatched up by a giant Pidgeot, everyone must work together to get them back!

media.title: Charizard Chills
media.description: After hearing about Ash from the Trovita Island Gym Leader, another Trainer seeks him out for a battle...and after Pikachu is knocked out, Ash turns to his Charizard. But can he get the unruly Pokémon to listen to him?

media.title: The Pokémon Water War
media.description: Our heroes’ plans are interrupted by a raging fire in a nearby warehouse. When they try to fight the flames, they quickly find themselves in need of the local fire department: Team Wartortle!

media.title: Pokémon Food Fight
media.description: When Snorlax's Poké Ball breaks, Ash has a huge problem on his hands: How can our heroes get the slumbering Snorlax over a mountain pass to the nearest Pokémon Center?

media.title: Pokémon Double Trouble
media.description: Ash is anxious to win the final badge of the Orange League, and soon gets a taste of this Gym Leader’s strength as she helps him fend off another Team Rocket sneak attack!

media.title: The Wacky Watcher
media.description: Discovering a scientist’s submarine at sea, our heroes are soon surrounded by his life’s research: a school of splashing Magikarp! They want to help him study Magikarp Evolution, but Team Rocket has other ideas…

media.title: The Stun Spore Detour
media.description: With Ash and Tracey paralyzed by a wild Vileplume’s Stun Spore, it’s up to Misty to find a local plant and save the day!

media.title: Hello Pummelo
media.description: With his four Orange League badges in hand, Ash has one last challenge to face before he can be crowned Champion of the Orange League. Does he have what it takes?

media.title: Enter The Dragonite
media.description: Ash’s battle for the Orange League Winner’s Trophy rages on, and it soon becomes apparent that he will have to take on a powerful Dragonite to become the Orange League Champion!

media.title: Viva Las Lapras
media.description: Trying to rescue a local school of Lapras from would-be poachers, our heroes must find a way to convince these distrustful Pokémon they are friends...before it’s too late!

media.title: The Underground Round Up
media.description: With Pallet Town on their minds, our heroes are searching for a ferry, but soon discover the port is abandoned...except for some explosive Electrode! Can Ash stop Team Rocket before the ferry goes up in smoke?

media.title: The Tent Situation
media.description: Ash has an eventful homecoming with a surprise visit from an old friend, a visit to see Professor Oak, and a Team Rocket raid. There’s no place like home!

media.title: A Rivalry Revival
media.description: After Gary comes to the rescue against Team Rocket, Ash seizes an opportunity…at long last, our hero gets to challenge his rival to their very first Pokémon battle!
